title: SA
text: Advertised for free shipping if my order was over $50; I was under the free shipping by 0.50 cents so I went back and chose an item to bring it to 50+ dollars. I entered one promo code that was offered on the website however I could not enter the second promo code for the free shipping for items over $50. Ended up paying $18 for shipping when it was advertised to be free. ðŸ˜¡
